messages.message: Did this get resolved yet? I'm still seeing this error on CI builds on backports to the 24.44 branch.
@sean.donohoe maybe you need to backport your PR to 24.44?
FYI I created the backport - seeing if it passes CI
hey sorry for the slow response -- @lydia could you link the backport here? happy to take a look and give a stamp :slightly_smiling_face:

On this Jenkins job (https://jenkins.instabase.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/instabase/detail/PR-64676/2/pipeline) (which kicked off before I merged the backport), I see the Cuda errors, but the job still keeps going. I assume it'll eventually end with a failure? Should we fail early in this case? so the dev isn't waiting around for the job to finish, just to find out that it failed?
Yes, we have all tests still run to completion so failures are all surfaced at once, rather than e.g. service A fails -> dev patches and re-runs -> service B fails -> dev patches and re-runs -> ...
